intro:
The sushi you know and love... as racecars?!
Operate your sushi vehicle and tear through course after course!
description:
SUSHI Race is a simple and fun game that anyone can enjoy!
Up to 4 players can join local multiplayer by sharing Joy-Con™!

Each sushi machine has its own appeal!
Battle and win with your favorites!

Drift around curves with flair!
Utilize items like soy-sauce missiles and blockers to outspeed your rivals!

【Time Attack】
Choose a course and record your best time!
Compete with players from around the world in online rankings!

【Free Race】
Choose a course to challenge with friends and CPUs!
Excitement will climb as items appear throughout the course!

【Grand Prix】
Run through several courses of your choice in order!
Accumulate wins and become the grand champion!

Enjoy playing with up to 4 players!
Challenge friends and family for 1st place and have fun!
